   21: %%
   22: 
   23: -module(ssl_ECC_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   26: 
   27: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   28: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_record.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   30: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   31: 
   32: 
   33: %% Common test
   34: -export([all/0,
   35:          groups/0,
   36:          init_per_suite/1,
   37:          init_per_group/2,
   38:          init_per_testcase/2,
   39:          end_per_suite/1,
   40:          end_per_group/2,
   41:          end_per_testcase/2
   42:         ]).
   43: 
   44: %% Test cases
   45: -export([ecc_default_order/1,
   46:          ecc_default_order_custom_curves/1,
   47:          ecc_client_order/1,
   48:          ecc_client_order_custom_curves/1,
   49:          ecc_unknown_curve_ecdhe_ecdsa/1,
   50:          ecc_unknown_curve_ecdhe_rsa/1,
   51:          client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom/1,
   52:          client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom/1,
   53:          client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom/1,
   54:          client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom/1,
   55:          client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdh_rsa_server_custom/1,
   56:          client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom/1,
   57:          client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom/1,
   58:          client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom/1,
   59:          client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom/1,
   60:          client_ecdsa_server_ecdsa_with_raw_key/1,
   61:          mix_sign/1
   62:         ]).
   63: 
   64: -define(DEFAULT_ECDSA, secp256r1).
   65: 
   66: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   67: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   68: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   69: 
   70: all() ->
   71:     [
   72:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   73:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   74:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
   75:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   76:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
   77:     ].
   78: 
   79: groups() ->
   80:     [
   81:      {'tlsv1.2', [], [mix_sign | test_cases()]},
   82:      {'tlsv1.1', [], test_cases()},
   83:      {'tlsv1', [], test_cases()},
   84:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], [mix_sign | test_cases()]},
   85:      {'dtlsv1', [], test_cases()}
   86:     ].
   87: 
   88: test_cases()->
   89:     misc() ++ ecc_negotiation().
   90: 
   91: misc()->
   92:     [client_ecdsa_server_ecdsa_with_raw_key].
   93: 
   94: ecc_negotiation() ->
   95:     [ecc_default_order,
   96:      ecc_default_order_custom_curves,
   97:      ecc_client_order,
   98:      ecc_client_order_custom_curves,
   99:      ecc_unknown_curve_ecdhe_ecdsa,
  100:      ecc_unknown_curve_ecdhe_rsa,
  101:      client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom,
  102:      client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom,
  103:      client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom,
  104:      client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom,
  105:      client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdh_rsa_server_custom,
  106:      client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom,
  107:      client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom,
  108:      client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom,
  109:      client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom
  110:     ].
  111: 
  112: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  113: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  114:     end_per_suite(Config0),
  115:     try crypto:start() of
  116: 	ok ->
  117:             case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support(cipher_ec) of
  118:                 true ->
  119:                     Config0;
  120:                 false ->
  121:                     {skip, "Crypto does not support ECC"}
  122:             end
  123:     catch _:_ ->
  124:             {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  125:     end.
  126: 
  127: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  128:     application:stop(ssl),
  129:     application:stop(crypto).
  130: 
  131: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  132: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  133:     case ssl_test_lib:is_protocol_version(GroupName) of
  134: 	true ->
  135:             ?CT_LOG("Ciphers: ~p~n ", [ssl:cipher_suites(default, GroupName)]),
  136:             ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName,
  137:                                         [{client_type, erlang},
  138:                                          {server_type, erlang},
  139:                                          {version, GroupName} | Config]);
  140:         false ->
  141:             Config
  142:     end.
  143: 
  144: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  145:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  146: 
  147: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  148: 
  149: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
  150:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  151:     end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config),
  152:     ssl:start(),
  153:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 5}),
  154:     Config.
  155: 
  156: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  157:     application:stop(ssl),
  158:     Config.
  159: 
  160: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  161: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  162: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  163: %% Test different certificate chain types, note that it is the servers
  164: %% chain that affect what cipher suite that will be chosen
  165: 
  166: client_ecdsa_server_ecdsa_with_raw_key(Config)  when is_list(Config) ->
  167:      Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  168:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  169:                                                        {client_chain, Default}]
  170:                                                      , ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  171:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  172:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  173:     ServerKeyFile = proplists:get_value(keyfile, SOpts),
  174:     {ok, PemBin} = file:read_file(ServerKeyFile),
  175:     PemEntries = public_key:pem_decode(PemBin),
  176:      {'ECPrivateKey', Key, not_encrypted} = proplists:lookup('ECPrivateKey', PemEntries),
  177:     ServerKey = {'ECPrivateKey', Key},
  178:     SType = proplists:get_value(server_type, Config),
  179:     CType = proplists:get_value(client_type, Config),
  180:     {Server, Port} =
  181:         ssl_test_lib:start_server_with_raw_key(SType,
  182:                                                [{key, ServerKey} | proplists:delete(keyfile, SOpts)],
  183:                                                Config),
  184:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client(CType, Port, COpts, Config),
  185:     ssl_test_lib:gen_check_result(Server, SType, Client, CType),
  186:     ssl_test_lib:stop(Server, Client).
  187: 
  188: ecc_default_order(Config) ->
  189:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  190:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  191:     DefaultCurve = hd(ssl:eccs(Version)),
  192:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  193:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  194:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa,
  195:                                                         Config, ?DEFAULT_ECDSA),
  196:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  197:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  198: 
  199:     SECCOpts = [],
  200:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs([{eccs, [DefaultCurve]}], Version) of
  201:         true ->  ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(DefaultCurve, COpts, SOpts, [], SECCOpts, Config);
  202:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  203:      end.
  204: 
  205: ecc_default_order_custom_curves(Config) ->
  206:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  207:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  208:     DefaultCurve = hd(ssl:eccs(Version)),
  209:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  210:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  211:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa,
  212:                                                         Config, ?DEFAULT_ECDSA),
  213:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  214:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  215:     SECCOpts = [{eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  216:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(SECCOpts, Version) of
  217:         true ->  ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(DefaultCurve, COpts, SOpts, [], SECCOpts, Config);
  218:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  219:     end.
  220: 
  221: ecc_client_order(Config) ->
  222:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  223:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  224:     DefaultCurve =  hd(ssl:eccs(Version)),
  225:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  226:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  227:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa,
  228:                                                         Config, ?DEFAULT_ECDSA),
  229:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  230:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  231:     SECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, false}],
  232:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs([{eccs, [DefaultCurve]}], Version) of
  233:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(DefaultCurve, COpts, SOpts, [], SECCOpts, Config);
  234:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  235:     end.
  236: 
  237: ecc_client_order_custom_curves(Config) ->
  238:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  239:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  240:     DefaultCurve = hd(ssl:eccs(Version)),
  241:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  242:                                                         {client_chain, Default}],
  243:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa,
  244:                                                         Config, ?DEFAULT_ECDSA),
  245:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  246:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  247:     SECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, false}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  248:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(SECCOpts, Version) of
  249:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(DefaultCurve, COpts, SOpts, [], SECCOpts, Config);
  250:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  251:     end.
  252: 
  253: ecc_unknown_curve_ecdhe_ecdsa(Config) ->
  254:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  255:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  256:                                                        {client_chain, Default}],
  257:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  258:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  259:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  260:     ECCALL = ssl:eccs(),
  261:     SECCOpts = [{eccs, [hd(ECCALL)]}],
  262:     CECCOpts = [{eccs, tl(ECCALL)}],
  263:     ssl_test_lib:ecc_test_error(COpts, SOpts, CECCOpts, SECCOpts, Config).
  264: 
  265: ecc_unknown_curve_ecdhe_rsa(Config) ->
  266:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  267:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  268:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  269:                                                         ecdhe_rsa, ecdhe_rsa, Config),
  270:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  271:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  272:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  273:     ECCs = ssl:eccs(Version),
  274:     CECCOpts = [{eccs, [hd(ECCs)]}],
  275:     SECCOpts = [{eccs, tl(ECCs)}],
  276:     ssl_test_lib:ecc_test_error(COpts, SOpts, CECCOpts, SECCOpts, Config).
  277: 
  278: client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  279:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  280:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  281:     DefaultCurve = hd(ssl:eccs(Version)),
  282:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  283:                                                        {client_chain, Default}],
  284:                                                         ecdh_rsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  285:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  286:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  287:     SECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  288:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(SECCOpts, Version) of
  289:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], SECCOpts, Config);
  290:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  291:     end.
  292: 
  293: client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  294:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  295:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  296:     DefaultCurve = hd(ssl:eccs(Version)),
  297:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  298:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  299:                                                         ecdh_rsa, ecdhe_rsa, Config),
  300:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  301:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  302:     SECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  303:     
  304:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(SECCOpts, Version) of
  305:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], SECCOpts, Config);
  306:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  307:     end.
  308: 
  309: client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  310:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  311:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  312:     DefaultCurve = hd(ssl:eccs(Version)),
  313:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  314:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  315:                                                         ecdhe_rsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  316:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  317:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  318: 
  319:     SECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  320:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(SECCOpts, Version) of
  321:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], SECCOpts, Config);
  322:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  323:     end.
  324: 
  325: client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  326:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  327:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  328:     DefaultCurve = hd(ssl:eccs(Version)),
  329:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  330:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  331:                                                         ecdhe_rsa, ecdhe_rsa, Config),
  332: 
  333:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  334:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  335: 
  336:     SECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  337:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(SECCOpts, Version) of
  338:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], SECCOpts, Config);
  339:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  340:     end.
  341: client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdh_rsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  342:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  343:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  344:     DefaultCurve = hd(ssl:eccs(Version)),
  345:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{key_usage, [keyEncipherment]}]),
  346:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, [[], [], [{extensions, Ext}]]},
  347:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  348:                                                         ecdhe_rsa, ecdh_rsa, Config),
  349: 
  350:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  351:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  352:     SECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  353:     Expected = secp256r1, %% The certificate curve
  354:     
  355:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(SECCOpts, Version) of
  356:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(Expected, COpts, SOpts, [], SECCOpts, Config);
  357:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  358:     end.
  359: 
  360: client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  361:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  362:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  363:     DefaultCurve = hd(ssl:eccs(Version)),
  364:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  365:                                                        {client_chain, Default}],
  366:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  367:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  368:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  369: 
  370:     SECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  371:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(SECCOpts, Version) of
  372:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], SECCOpts, Config);
  373:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  374:     end.
  375: 
  376: client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  377:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  378:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  379:     DefaultCurve = hd(ssl:eccs(Version)),
  380:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  381:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  382:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_rsa, Config),
  383:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  384:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  385:     SECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  386:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(SECCOpts, Version) of
  387:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], SECCOpts, Config);
  388:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  389:     end.
  390: 
  391: client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom(Config) ->
  392:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  393:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  394:     DefaultCurve = hd(ssl:eccs(Version)),
  395:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  396:                                                        {client_chain, Default}],
  397:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  398:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  399:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  400: 
  401:     CECCOpts = [{eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  402:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(CECCOpts, Version) of
  403:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, CECCOpts, [], Config);
  404:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  405:     end.
  406: 
  407: client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom(Config) ->
  408:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  409:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  410:     DefaultCurve = pubkey_cert_records:namedCurves(hd(tls_v1:ecc_curves(?TLS_1_0))),
  411:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  412:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  413:                                                          ecdhe_rsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  414:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  415:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  416:     CECCOpts = [{eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  417:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(CECCOpts, Version) of
  418:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, CECCOpts, [], Config);
  419:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  420:     end.
  421: 
  422: mix_sign(Config) ->
  423:     mix_sign_rsa_peer(Config),
  424:     mix_sign_ecdsa_peer(Config).
  425: 
  426: mix_sign_ecdsa_peer(Config) ->
  427:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_mix_cert([{mix, peer_ecc} |Config]),
  428:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  429:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  430:     ECDHE_ECDSA =
  431:         ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(default, 'tlsv1.2'),
  432:                                  [{key_exchange, fun(ecdhe_ecdsa) -> true; (_) -> false end}]),
  433:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(COpts, [{ciphers, ECDHE_ECDSA} | SOpts], Config).
  434: 
  435: 
  436: mix_sign_rsa_peer(Config) ->
  437:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_mix_cert([{mix, peer_rsa} |Config]),
  438:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  439:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  440:     ECDHE_RSA =
  441:         ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(default, 'tlsv1.2'),
  442:                                  [{key_exchange, fun(ecdhe_rsa) -> true; (_) -> false end}]),
  443:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(COpts, [{ciphers, ECDHE_RSA} | SOpts], Config).
  444: 
  445:
